General.Name: ESTec Corporation
General.Description: ESTec Corporation manufactures and sells automotive speakers in South Korea and internationally. It also offers TV/display and audio speakers, and earphones and headphones for automobiles, TVs, and home audio systems. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Yangsan-si, South Korea.
